name: Tachyonic Antitelephone
description:
You are Travis, member of a futuristic scientist group whose goal is to create a time machine. By accident, you switched on the machine when it was not ready, causing you to get stuck in a time loop. 

You need to fix the time machine, travel back in time, and stop yourself. The only way to do so however, is to flip all 6 switches within 10 seconds.

Beware,  as the time machine is defective as you loop, time and space might have been distorted.

The current build for the game jam has several bug that has since been address an hour after the jam ended. The patched build can be found here:

https://drive.google.com/open?id=1LSt7-rpiVvT7q9gVwlsa9N5a1YiaDz-v
